plot: A witty, touching comedy-drama about a thirtysomething gay man who is surprised to find himself falling in love with a woman.
plot_en: A witty, touching comedy-drama about a thirtysomething gay man who is surprised to find himself falling in love with a woman.
plot_es: A witty, touching comedy-drama about a thirtysomething gay man who is surprised to find himself falling in love with a woman.
title: Bob & Rose
